title: Cambridge Analytica scandal
extract: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia. The Facebook–Cambridge Analytica data scandal was a major political scandal in early 2018 when it was revealed that Cambridge Analytica had harvested the personal data of millions of people's Facebook profiles without their consent and used it for political purposes.
